FarmConnect FarmConnect Join our community of farmers\n and buyers and support \nlocal agriculture Add your phone number. We\'ll send you a verification code so we know you are real. +256- 123456789 Send Verification Code By clicking continue, \nI hereby agree and accept the \nTerms of Service and Privacy Policy \nin use of FarmConnect app Didn\'t you receive any code? Resend Code Verify Phone Number Enter Your OTP Code Sent To. Settings Help Create New Contact Create New Group profile picture Username Collection Zones help you to set up virtual markets \n to collect products from your customers

EmptyZonesFragmentLabel Hello blank fragment No collection zones currently setup No products have been posted to this zone yet Yo don\'t have people using this app \n in your contacts Contacts on Farm Connect Save eg. 10000 Unit Price Total Amount 0 eg. 10bags or 50kgs Quantity eg. coffee, beans, potatoes Product Name Product Image Products To Collect Description Location such district,village Zone Name Purchases You can\'t remove this product because, removing it would delete it permanently. By Clicking Ok, you will remove this product from this zone SettingsActivity
